Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards

Class Effect

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.Effect
  • public class Effect
extends java.lang.Object

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      java.util.ArrayList<Color> cost
      The cost of this effect.
      boolean isLinear
      True if the effect is only applicable in one direction
      int maxDistance
      Maximum distance between the offender and the defender 100 is considered INF
      int minDistance
      Minimum distance between the offender and the defender
      boolean mustBeDifferentSpots
      True if nPlayersAttackable > 1 && all the defenders must be in different spots
      boolean mustBeOtherRoom
      True if the defender must be in a different room
      boolean mustBeSameSpots
      True if nPlayersAttackable > 1 && all the defenders must be in same spots
      boolean mustShootOtherPlayers
      Refers to the player the offender attacked in the last effect.
      boolean mustShootSamePlayers
      Refers to the player the offender attacked in the last effect.
      int nDamages
      Damages to give to the defender
      int nMarks
      Marks to give to the defender
      int nMoves
      Moves the offender can do
      int nMovesOtherPlayer
      Moves the defender can do
      int nPlayersAttackable
      Players receiving mark by this single effect
      int nPlayersMarkable
      Players receiving damages by this single effect
      Visibility visibleByWho
      Defines who the defender must be visible by Refer to the Visibility class for clarification

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor Description
      protected Effect​(com.google.gson.JsonObject jsonEffect)
      Creates an effect by reading the jsonObject
      protected Effect​(Effect effectToCopy)
      Creates a new effect by copying another one --> e.g. this is used in the method getEffect() {return new Effect(this.effect);} to avoid overwriting

    • Field Detail

      • nDamages

        public final int nDamages
        Damages to give to the defender

      • nMarks

        public final int nMarks
        Marks to give to the defender

      • nPlayersMarkable

        public final int nPlayersMarkable
        Players receiving damages by this single effect

      • nPlayersAttackable

        public final int nPlayersAttackable
        Players receiving mark by this single effect

      • mustShootOtherPlayers

        public final boolean mustShootOtherPlayers
        Refers to the player the offender attacked in the last effect. True if the offender must attack an other player

      • mustShootSamePlayers

        public final boolean mustShootSamePlayers
        Refers to the player the offender attacked in the last effect. True if the offender can attack the last defender and any other player

      • cost

        public final java.util.ArrayList<Color> cost
        The cost of this effect. Null if cost == 0

      • nMoves

        public final int nMoves
        Moves the offender can do

      • nMovesOtherPlayer

        public final int nMovesOtherPlayer
        Moves the defender can do

      • minDistance

        public final int minDistance
        Minimum distance between the offender and the defender

      • maxDistance

        public final int maxDistance
        Maximum distance between the offender and the defender 100 is considered INF

      • mustBeOtherRoom

        public final boolean mustBeOtherRoom
        True if the defender must be in a different room

      • mustBeDifferentSpots

        public final boolean mustBeDifferentSpots
        True if nPlayersAttackable > 1 && all the defenders must be in different spots

      • mustBeSameSpots

        public final boolean mustBeSameSpots
        True if nPlayersAttackable > 1 && all the defenders must be in same spots

      • isLinear

        public final boolean isLinear
        True if the effect is only applicable in one direction

      • visibleByWho

        public final Visibility visibleByWho
        Defines who the defender must be visible by Refer to the Visibility class for clarification

      • Effect

        protected Effect​(Effect effectToCopy)
        Creates a new effect by copying another one --> e.g. this is used in the method getEffect() {return new Effect(this.effect);} to avoid overwriting
        Parameters:
        effectToCopy - the effect to copy
